meaningMnemonic: A <radical>fire</radical> in the <radical>rice paddy</radical> burns down the <kanji>field</kanji>. The rice paddy fire spreads out from the paddy and consumes the field next to it. This rice paddy fire has ravaged your entire farm!
readingMnemonic: Your rice paddy farm and <kanji>field</kanji> are on a cay. A cay is a small, sandy island, and since your farm is on fire, this cay has turned into a hot cay. Or as Mario would say, that’s one-a <reading>hot-a cay</reading>! (はたけ) Mama mia!
